descriptions.en:
Spawns a ï„ˆHeavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
â€¢ ï„†Primary Weapons: 4.25x
â€¢ ï„‡Special Weapons: 1.05x
â€¢ Exotic ï„†Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 5.525?â x)

Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Grants 20% Damage Resistance while overcharging a î…„Void Grenade with î…„Chaos Accelerant.

Grenade Hits grant 2000% [1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.

4 second cooldown between activations.

Charged î…„Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.

descriptions.en:
On Class Ability Usage with 1|2+ Mods equipped:
Collects Orbs of Power within 12.5|18.5 meters.

Also collects Motes of Light in Gambit as well as Crests in Supremacy.

Weapon or Grenade Kills grant a Stacking Damage Buff and 20 Handling for 4.5 seconds. Grenade Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.

Damage Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%

20 Manejo y Aumento de DaÃ±o acumulable, durante 4.5 segundos

El bufo se renueva con cada baja. Baja con granada otorga la maxima cantidad de DaÃ±o

descriptions.en:
Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
â€¢ PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% increased damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
â€¢ PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% increased damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While within 15 metres of an ally:
Grants a Stack of Nano-Munitions every 3 seconds, up to the maximum of 7. Consuming a Stack restarts the timer.

Consumes a Stack upon emptying the magazine to refill 25% of it.

Readying a Power Weapon removes all Stacks.

After Aiming Down Sights for ğŸ¡…1.4 seconds without firing, for one shot:
â€¢ 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
â€¢ Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5xğŸ š2.5x)

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)

ğŸ¡… Activation time is reduced by 0.1 seconds.

Special Ammo Finder Bricks you create also spawn a copy for your allies.

Ammo Bricks spawned this way grant 27.5%|60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2 Mods equipped.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.
Loads 2 Ammo at a time.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
â€¢ Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
â€¢ Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
â€¢ Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
â€¢ Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | 25% [20%] | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

Remains active while stowed.

The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

10|5|1 second cooldown between activations with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.

Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
â€¢ 3 | 6 | 9 | 12 | 20 Range
â€¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 50 Reload Speed
â€¢ ? | ? | ? | ? | 30? Stability
â€¢ ? | ? | ? | ? | ? Handling
â€¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 35 | 55 Charge Rate (Swords)
â€¢ 5 | 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 Guard Resistance (Swords)

Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
â€¢ ï„†Primary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
â€¢ ï„‡Special Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
â€¢ ï„ˆPower Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201

Each Hit grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank. Does not require Direct Hits.

Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
â€¢ Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
â€¢ Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
â€¢ Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
â€¢ Enemy Players: 10 Points

Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
â€¢ ï„†Primary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
â€¢ Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x

Grants the following benefits for your first shot (of the burst) after 3.1 seconds of not firing the weapon:
â€¢ 20 Aim Assist and 25 Range
â€¢ 5% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
â€¢ 10% decreased Accuracy Cone Growth

ï„‡Special weapons only receive 50% of the benefits. Stats are rounded up.

descriptions.en: Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Passively grants the Overload Shot buff to Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type and increases their damage against Overload Champions by 80%.

Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Breaking a PVE Combatant's Shield with a î„¹Stasis or î¼Strand Weapon has a chance to î„¹Freeze (if î„¹Stasis Weapon) or î¼Suspend (if î¼Strand Weapon) them.

Wearing seasonal armor improves the chances of the perk triggering.
Killing a Frozen PVE Combatant spawns a î„¹Stasis Crystal close to the target's location. Bosses spawn 2 î„¹Crystals.
Dealing î…€Solar Ability Damage to Bosses and Champions î…„Weakens them for 6 seconds.
Picking up an Orb of Power grants î¼Unraveling Rounds for 7 [5] seconds.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to î…€Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles, Eyes of Tomorrow, and Two-Tailed Fox do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Class Ability Usage changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

ğŸ¡… Passively grants 5 Handling.

Splits off 50% of the Weapon's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE and isn't affected by damage Falloff.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.

ğŸ¡… Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
â€¢ Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
â€¢ Sidearms: 12
â€¢ SMGs: 13

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
â€¢ Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
â€¢ Sidearms: 12
â€¢ SMGs: 13
Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Onslaught for 4.5 seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Benefits at 1|2|3 Stacks of Onslaught:
â€¢ 16% | 28% | 37% decreased Firing Delay
â€¢ 15 | 25 | 35 Reload Speed

Grants the following to î¼Strand Weapons 1 second after readying them:
â€¢ 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
â€¢ 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants the following to î…ƒArc Weapons 1 second after readying them:
â€¢ 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
â€¢ 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
â€¢ 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon scoring a Precision Kill or 3 kills within 3 seconds of each:
Spawns a î¼Threadling on Enemy Death Location.

ğŸ¡… Passively grants 5 Handling.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a î…„Void or î¼Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

'Multi-Dodge Ready' appears on the Buff List while within 15 meters of an enemy.

Dodging while Multi-Dodge is ready allows you to chain dodges infinitely for 6 seconds. Kills extend the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 11 seconds.

Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate:
â€¢ î„¹Winter's Shroud and î¼Threaded Specter Aspects
â€¢ Dynamo, Bomber, Outreach, and Distribution Armor Mods

î¼Ensnaring Slam removes the buff after one usage.

Finishing a reload overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% of the Base Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for each ally within 15 meters.

Overfill amount maxes out at 50%.

On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large î„¹Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.

[Tier 1-2 Minor](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium î„¹Stasis Crystal.

5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.

Powered Hits grant 3% increased damage for ğŸ¡…4 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.

Blocking removes all stacks.

ğŸ¡… Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Missing has a chance to refund 1 ammo into the magazine based on the ammo type:
â€¢ ï„†Primary Weapons: ğŸ¡…40%
â€¢ ï„‡Special and ï„ˆPower Weapons: ğŸ¡…25%

ğŸ¡… Ammo Refund chance is increased by an additive 5%.

Upon scoring a set percentage of the Magazine Capacity as hits within ? seconds of each:
Fires a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.

Rockets deal 22.4 [14] impact and 24 [15] explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). On non-primary weapons, the rockets receive and additional damage increase.

% of Magazine Capacity as hits required and the Additional Damage Increase by weapon archetype:
â€¢ Hand Cannons, Pulse Rifles, Submachine Guns: 45% Magazine Capacity \\ 0% increased damage (Baseline)
â€¢ Sniper Rifles: 50%? \\ 100%
â€¢ Grenade Launchers: 30% \\ 25%
â€¢ Machine Guns: 25% \\ 50%
â€¢ Fusion Rifles, Shotguns: ?% \\ 150%

Further hits do not provide activation progress for 1 second after activation.

Precision Kills cause targets to explode, dealing up to 123.89 [95.3] elemental damage in a 4.5 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

ğŸ¡… Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Increases damage against shielded targets:
â€¢ 125% increase against PVE Combatant (Over)Shields
â€¢ 50% increase against Barrier Champion Shields
â€¢ 20% increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with î¼Woven Mail

Combatant Shields include Elemental Shields, and Lucent Moth/Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) Overshields.

ğŸ¡… Damage Buff is increased.

Scoring 2 to 3 î„¹Stasis Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of î„¹Stasis Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds. Further î„¹Stasis Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard with a cooldown matching Towering Barricade's.

On Glacial Guard Cast:
â€¢ Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
â€¢ Grants the maximum 4 Stack of Weapon Surge
â€¢ Applies 40 î„¹Slow Stacks to PVE Combatants within 7 meters

Shielded:
â€¢ Grants a 100 HP Overshield that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE (breaking this overshield removes the buff)
â€¢ Prevents sprinting, using jump abilities, and sliding
â€¢ Cannot regain Class Ability Energy while active
â€¢ Taking damage refreshes the buff duration
â€¢ Class Ability activation removes the buff

descriptions.en:
Glaive Melee Kills load 1 Ammo into the Magazine from reserves. Can overfill the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.

While within 15 meters of 3+ enemies:
Grants 50 Reload Speed and 100% Increased Melee Damage to Glaives.

On Projectile Kills with Glaives Matching your Subclass Element:
Enemies explode, dealing up to 350 [101] damage in a 4? meter radius.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine (rounds up) and grants ğŸ¡…25 Range and Stability for your next shot within 2.5 seconds.

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can activate multiple times during a slide.

ğŸ¡… Stat bonuses are increased by 5?.

Grants the following benefits if you have not dealt or received damage in the last 5 seconds:
â€¢ 20 Range and 20 Handling
â€¢ 15% decreased Draw Time on Bows
â€¢ 10.78% increased damage against PvE Combatants. Linear Fusion Rifles only receive an 8.88% damage increase.

Deactivates 2 seconds after exchanging damage.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to î„¹Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.
descriptions.es:
En tiros de Precision:
Reduce en un 25% el tiempo de tensado durante 3 segundos

Aumentado: Aumenta la duracion del bufo a 4 segundos

Linearly grants up to 100 Reload Speed and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.

Grants the following for 7 seconds upon breaking an enemy's shield or destroying a [Vehicle or Construct](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
â€¢ 40 Reload Speed
â€¢ ?x Draw Time Multiplier

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants Peregrine Strike after sprinting for 2 seconds and being airborne for 0.5 seconds. Buff is removed upon touching the ground.

Peregrine Strike increases the Impact Damage of Shoulder Charge Abilities by 225%.

Against [Minibosses](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) (inlcuding Champions and Tormentors), the buff is increased to 1000% and refunds your Melee Ability charge on hit.

Provides no benefits when hitting î„¹Frozen enemies.

On Powered Melee or Finisher Kills:
Grants î…„Void Invisibility and restores Health, with Finishers providing a greater benefit to both.

Invisibility Duration and restored Health are based on the [rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the defeated target. î…„Echo of Persistence increases Invisibility duration by 41.5%.

Invisibility|Health granted on Powered Melee Kills:
â€¢ Minors: 6.8 seconds | 100 HP
â€¢ Elites, Enemy Players: 9.8s | ? HP
â€¢ Minibosses: 12.8s | ? HP
â€¢ Bosses: 13.3s | 200 HP

Invisibility|Health granted on Finisher Kills:
â€¢ Minors: 9.8 seconds | ? HP
â€¢ Elites: 12.7 seconds | 200 HP
â€¢ Minibosses: 15.8 seconds | 200 HP
â€¢ Bosses: ? seconds | ? HP

descriptions.en:
Upon sliding after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds with your Class Ability fully charged:
Projects a 180Â° frontal shield that reflects all incoming projectiles for 0.45 seconds.

Reflected projectiles deal 50% increased damage.

After shield deactivation, 2% Class Ability energy is drained for every point of damage reflected.

Currently partially bugged and does not drain Class Ability Energy for projectiles reflected at the end of your slide.

Scoring multiple Hits against enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy. Does not require Direct Hits.

Hit requirements for activation:
â€¢ Bows: 5 Hits
â€¢ Swords: 10 Hits
â€¢ Grenade Launchers: 12? Hits

â€¢ 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
â€¢ 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 5 [3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hit Requirements by Weapon Type:
â€¢ Bows, Glaives, Rocket Launchers: 3
â€¢ Sidearms: 12
â€¢ SMGs: 13
Powered Melee Hits make you and allies within 8 meters î…€Radiant for 8 seconds (12 with î…€Ember of Solace).

Targets killed by î…€Solar Supers î…€Ignite and spawn a î…€Firesprite at their location.

Deadshot Golden Gun refunds 1 ammo per kill.

Note: î…€Well of Radiance makes all of the caster's Weapon Damage count as Super Ability Damage so î…€Solar Weapons Kills will also count as î…€Solar Super Kills.

î…€Solar Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Ember of Tempering for 8 seconds to you and allies within 12.5 meters.

î…€Ember of Tempering grants the following benefits:
â€¢ 10|20|30 Recovery at 1|2|3 Stacks
â€¢ 20 Airborne Effectiveness
â€¢ î…€Solar Weapon Kills spawn a î…€Firesprite

î…€Ignitions apply 40 î…€Scorch Stacks (60 with î…€Ember of Ashes) to enemies damaged by the explosion.

Does not apply to the î…€Ignited enemy.

Applying certain buffs to allies grants 400% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 6 [3] seconds.

Activation Triggers:
â€¢ Granting the î…€Cure, î…€Radiant, or î…€Restoration î…€Solar subclass buffs to allies
â€¢ Healing (from most sources), or reviving allies

Will NOT trigger î…€Ember of Benevolence:
Empowering Rifts, Mods, Crest of Alpha Lupi's Healing Pulse, and Aeon Sect of Vigor's Healing

Grants 300% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate for 3 seconds upon applying î…€Scorch to enemies.

Will not activate if the enemy dies from the hit that would have applied î…€Scorch.

î…€Solar Kills extend the duration of î…€Restoration and î…€Radiant effects up to the maximum of 15 seconds.

Time added based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
â€¢ Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 2 seconds
â€¢ T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 3s
â€¢ T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Enemy Players: 4s
â€¢ T4 Minors, T3 Elies, and higher: 8s

Solar Super projectiles home in on enemies.

Only affects Blade Barrage and Daybreak projectiles.

î…€Restoration and î…€Radiant effects applied to you last 50% longer.

Specific increases from î…€Ember of Solace for î…€Restoration and î…€Radiant sources can be found in their descriptions.

î…€Ignition Kills grant Grenade Energy based on the [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the killed targets:
â€¢ Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
â€¢ T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 12.25%
â€¢ T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 16.5%
â€¢ Players: 20.75%
â€¢ T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Successive Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a ramping Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits (20% on SMGs). Missing deactivates the buff.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.33%

All thresholds are increased by 60% for Submachine Guns, initially triggering at 20% and maxing out at 176.53%.

Damage Buff ramps up from 16.73% [10.46%] to 40% [25%] upon reaching maximum strength.

Assuming no missed shots, it provides roughly a 25% [15.85%] [Damage Buff on average](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) after firing 100% of the Magazine.
Radar immediately returns once no longer Aiming Down Sights. (Normally takes 1.5 seconds)

Grants Grenade Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Grenade Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
12% [6%] | 17% [8.5%] | 20% [10%]

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a 20% [15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Fusion Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and detonate on impact, stunning Unstoppable Champions.

Fusion Grenade Kills refund Grenade Energy based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
â€¢ Minors: 25%
â€¢ Elites: 50%
â€¢ Players, Minibosses, Bosses: 100%

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness, 100 Handling and 100 Reload Speed to Sidearms.

Upon readying a Sidearm while at Critical Health:
â€¢ Refills the Magazine of the Sidearm from reserves
â€¢ Grants 100% [10%] increased damage until you are no longer at Critical Health, after which it has a 5 second duration

Sidearm Kills extend the buff duration by 3 seconds (capped at 5 seconds) and refill your Magazine from reserves.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing extremely close to the barricade also consistently prevents enemy melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
â€¢ 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
â€¢ 50% Flinch Resistance
â€¢ 30 Stability
â€¢ 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Performs an quick first-person dash, moving 8 meters in your current input direction.

Not inputting a movement direction results in a 4 meter backwards dash.

Only usable while on the ground.

Grants 1|2 Stacks while within 15 meters of 1|2+ enemies.

Bonuses at 1|2 Stacks:
â€¢ ğŸ¡…19|ğŸ¡…44 Stability
â€¢ ğŸ¡…19|ğŸ¡…63 Reload Speed
â€¢ 25|100 Handling
â€¢ 0.9x|0.81x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier

ğŸ¡… Grants 4? more stability when active as well as 1|3 more Reload Speed at 1|2 Stacks.

Breaking an enemy shield transfers one bullet from reserves. Breaking a combatant shieldâ€”or the shield of a Guardian using a Superâ€”with that shield's energy type grants bonus damage for the rest of the magazine.

On Weapon Kill, for 8.5 seconds:
Grants 100 Handling and a 0.825x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier to all weapons.

Additional kills while the perk is active refresh the duration to 6.5 seconds.

Activation progress by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
Minors: 34% | Players, Elites, and higher: 100%

Duration is not refreshable. Stacks with other Sprint Speed buffs up to the cap of a 12.5% increase.

descriptions.en:
After sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
Grants 35 ADS and Ready Handling while sprinting.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a î…€Solar or î„¹Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Swords are granted 30|50|60 Charge Rate with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Glaive Projectile Hits grant 20%|30%|35% Increased Weapon Energy. (Stacks additively with Immovable Object)

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to î…€Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to î…ƒArc Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles and Wardcliff Coil do not receive any extra ammo on pickups.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Weapon Kills grant ğŸ¡…11% Melee Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant ğŸ¡…22%.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 35 Handling for 3 seconds.

ğŸ¡… Melee Ability Energy gains are increased by 10%. (e.g. 10%ğŸ š11%)

Grants 40% [5%] Damage Resist while within 10 meters of a î„¹Frozen Enemy or a Friendly î„¹Crystal.

Lingers for 0.65 seconds once no longer in range.

Receiving damage from an enemy grants 5% Grenade Energy. Being at Critical Health increases this to 10%.

1 second cooldown between activations.

Grants Melee Energy once per second while within 15 meters of 2+ Enemies:
â€¢ 2 Enemies: 2.5% Melee Energy per second
â€¢ 3+ Enemies: 5% Melee Energy per second

Powered Melee Hits grant 40 Handling for 5 seconds and refill all weapons from reserves.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Melee Ability Charge.

Void Invisibility grants 50% [10%] Damage Resist.

Cloaking allies grants them the same Damage Resist benefits and refunds 50% Melee Ability Energy per ally made invisible.

Damage Resistance does not apply while in Super.

Spawns a ï„ˆHeavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
â€¢ ï„†Primary Weapons: 4.25x
â€¢ ï„‡Special Weapons: 1.05x
â€¢ Exotic ï„†Primary Weapons: further 1.3?x on top of the Primary Multiplier (total of 5.525?â x)

Rocket-Assisted Sidearms count as Primary Weapons. Eriana's Vow inherits the Exotic Primary Multiplier but is still treated as a Special Weapon.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Direct Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Precision Instrument for 1.25 seconds (2.1 seconds on Bows). Maximum of 6 Stacks. Missing removes all Stacks.

Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
â€¢ Refills 10% of the Magazine (rounded up) from thin air. Can be reactivated without a cooldown. Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.

Hits against Constructs and Vehicles provide 1.5x activation progress for ï„†Primary weapons and 2x progress for ï„‡Special weapons.

Pellet Shotguns, Rocket-Assisted Sidearms, and non-Wave Frame Grenade Launchers can trigger the perk twice on initial activations (when the buff isn't active). Note: please don't ask about the specifics of this.

Wave Frame Grenade Launchers:
â€¢ Direct Impacts count as 2 Hits
â€¢ Doesn't receive bonus activation progress against Constructs and Vehicles

Pellet Shotguns:
â€¢ Runs into network-related issues for triggering the perk and granting ammo on non-construct hits
â€¢ Only needs one pellet to hit per shot, they aren't considered separate Hits for the purpose of the perk
â€¢ Activation progress granted by each shot scales with distance: point-blank shots follow the standard formula but as few as 2 shots can trigger the perk on more distant targets

Marked enemies are highlighted for allies and take 20% increased damage from them. Damage increase stacks with everything.

descriptions.en:
Finishing a Reload restores health based on the number of hits scored with the weapon before reloading.

Scoring 100% of the Magazine as hits restores 50 HP. No known upper limit to the total amount.

Glaive Melee hits don't count. Grenade Launcher hits each count as 50% of the Magazine.

Splits off 50% of the Bow's Bodyshot damage into an Explosive damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PvE.

Detonation time after hitting a target or surface varies on draw and distance.

[PvE] Total damage is increased by ~15% of the weapon's Bodyshot damage. On crits, the overall increase is 10.33% for Precision Bows and 9.69% for Lightweight Bows.

[PvP] Don't want to talk about it.

Grants an extra Melee Charge to Solar Subclasses.

All Melee Charges are recharged simultaneously.
(e.g.: both are recharged on Gambler's Dodge)

â€¢ Knife Trick Precision Kills and Direct î…€Ignition Kills in which Knife Trick applies î…€Scorch restore both Charges

On Weapon Kill for 7 seconds:
â€¢ 30% increased damage
â€¢ 20% longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
â€¢ 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% damage increase.

â€¢ 30 Handling

It initially triggers as you drop to 40 Shield HP â€” giving you 50% of the maximum buff. However, as you regenerate your Shield Health, the buff will still remain until you reach 80 Shield HP where the benefits scale down to zero.

Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for 2.5 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
â€¢ Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
â€¢ Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
â€¢ Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

â€¢ Sidearms: 12

Spawns a ï„‡Special Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Weapons of Sorrow: Thorn, Osteo Striga, Touch of Malice, and Necrochasm.

Melee Hits apply Necrotic Poison (Poison for short). Poisoned enemies spread Poison on death in a 5 meter radius.

Kills with the following also spread Poison:
â€¢ Thorn's Bullets
â€¢ Osteo Striga's Poison Effect
â€¢ Touch of Malice's Blight's Poison Effect
â€¢ Necrochasm's Poison and Cursed Thrall Explosions

Poison ticks every 0.517 [0.7] seconds for a total of 19 [?] ticks over 9.3 [?] seconds. Deals a total of 1361 [?] damage over the entire duration.

Poison's first tick deals 32.35 [5?] damage.

In PvE, the damage of Poison ramps up every tick with the damage increases compounding together:
â€¢ 2nd-14th ticks each deal 3.5585 more damage compared to the one before
â€¢ 15th tick deals 9.705 more damage than the 14th
â€¢ 16th-19th ticks each deal 14.234 more damage than the one before

Weapon Hits grant stacks of Enlightened Action for 2 seconds. Stacks 12 times.

Stat bonuses at 1|2|â€¦|12 Stacks:
2|7|12|15|20|25|30|35|38|40|45|50 Handling and Reload Speed

Stacks granted per hit by Weapon Type:
â€¢ Hand Cannons: 3 Stacks
â€¢ Bows: ? Stacks
â€¢ Automatic Weapons: 1 Stack

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Weapon matching your Subclass Element.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Reduces Incoming î…€Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Finishers make enemies within ? meters î…„Volatile.

Killing î…„Volatile enemies spawns a î…„Void Breach.

Killing an enemy while at Critical Health grants a 45 HP î…„Void Overshield for 5 seconds (7.5 with î…„Echo of Persistence).

8 second cooldown between activations.

Passively grants:
â€¢ 35% increased Projectile Velocity
â€¢ ğŸ¡…25 Reload Speed

(Reload Duration Multiplier for Bows and Rocket-Assisted Sidearms is unknown but it's likely one of the listed values)

ğŸ¡… Reload Speed Bonus is increased by 5.

Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Scoring multiple Direct Hits against a target within 3 seconds of each emits 3 damaging shockwaves from its location at the time of activation.

Shockwaves appear 0.285 seconds after scoring enough Hits and have a 1 second delay between each pulse.

Each shockwave deals up to 120 [20] damage in a 5? meter radius. Shockwaves deal 25% less damage when activated on [Minor and Elite](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) PvE Combatants.

Shockwaves inherit Weapon Damage Buffs, the weapon's passive Kinetic Damage Bonus in PVE (10% on ï„†Primary, 15% on ï„‡Special), and its [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). They also count as non-direct Hits with the weapon for other interactions.

The perk cannot be retriggered by anyone on a target until 2? seconds after the last shockwave.

Hits Required for Activation:

â€¢ Pulse Rifles: 11
â€¢ Non-burst Sidearms: 8
â€¢ Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 6

descriptions.en:
Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.
Increases Super Energy Gains from Melee Kills based on enemy rank.

1 second after stowing a Weapon matching your Subclass Element:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Grants 35% Flinch Resistance after ğŸ¡…0.9 seconds of Aiming Down Sights (ADS) without firing. Remains active until you're no longer ADS.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

ğŸ¡… Activation time is reduced by 10%.

While Aiming Down Sights and targeting an Enemy:
Fired Rockets track the targeted enemy. Diminshed effectiveness in PVP.

Tracking persists for 1 second once no longer aiming at the enemy.

Grants the following benefits for 11 seconds upon reaching Critical Health, or on Ally Death:
â€¢ Refills magazine from reserves
â€¢ 5 Range and 10 Handling
â€¢ Decreases Charge Time by 2.5%

Grants the following for 7 seconds upon readying the weapon within 7? seconds of scoring a kill with a different weapon:
â€¢ 0.75?x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
â€¢ 25% decreased Accuracy Cone Size
â€¢ 30 Airborne Effectiveness

Weapon Kills while Discord is active fully refill the Magazine of ï„†Primary Weapons, and refund 1 Ammo for ï„‡Special Weapons. (Scoring multiple kills with a single shot/burst still only refunds 1 ammo.)

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to î¼Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

While Aiming Down Sights with î¼Strand Weapons:
Grants 25%|30%|35% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants the following to î…„Void Weapons 1 second after readying them:
â€¢ 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
â€¢ 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Hits have a chance to activate Veist Stinger for 7 seconds, granting the following bonuses:
â€¢ Refills 25% of Magazine from reserves on activation
â€¢ Decreases ADS Movement Speed Penalty by 10%
â€¢ Grants 15% decreased Draw Time to Bows
â€¢ Grants ? Charge Rate to Swords

4 second cooldown between activations.

Activation Chance on hits:
â€¢ Auto Rifle, Submachine Gun: 2%
â€¢ Sidearm: 4%
â€¢ Bow, Linear Fusion Rifle, Sniper Rifle: 10%

descriptions.en:
On Enemy Player Kills while at or below 90 HP:
Grants an Enhanced Radar and removes you from passively pinging enemy radars for 10 seconds.

Firing weapons will still ping enemy radars for 2 seconds.

Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
â€¢ Refills 10% of the Magazine (rounded up) from thin air. Can be reactivated without a cooldown. Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.
â€¢ Grants 40% increased damage against [Constructs and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) for 5 seconds. Additional hits refresh the buff duration.

Number of Hits Required:
â€¢ If Magazine Size is 1: 3 Hits
â€¢ Otherwise: 2 + 50% (25% on ï„†Primary Weapons) of Base Magazine Capacity rounded down

Hits against Constructs and Vehicles provide 1.5x activation progress for ï„†Primary weapons and 2x progress for ï„‡Special weapons.

Pellet Shotguns, Rocket-Assisted Sidearms, and non-Wave Frame Grenade Launchers can trigger the perk twice on initial activations (when the buff isn't active). Note: please don't ask about the specifics of this.

Wave Frame Grenade Launchers:
â€¢ Direct Impacts count as 2 Hits
â€¢ Doesn't receive bonus activation progress against Constructs and Vehicles

Pellet Shotguns:
â€¢ Runs into network-related issues for triggering the perk and granting ammo on non-construct hits
â€¢ Only needs one pellet to hit per shot, they aren't considered separate Hits for the purpose of the perk
â€¢ Activation progress granted by each shot scales with distance: point-blank shots follow the standard formula but as few as 2 shots can trigger the perk on more distant targets
All Armor Charge sources grant an additional Stack.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and generate a Special Ammo Brick for you and allies.

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Melee Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Finishers consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant a 45 HP î…„Void Overshield.

Overshield lasts 8|10|12|14 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stacks of Armor Charge consumed.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge to fully restore Health and Shields.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge and refill all your weapons from reserves.

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Grenade Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Upon finishing a reload, for 6 seconds:
Grants 40 Handling and 20% Flinch Resistance.

Cannot be refreshed. Persists while stowed.

Replaces Grenade Ability with 'Cage of Loyal Moths', grants an extra Grenade Ability Charge. Overrides Base (T3) Grenade Ability cooldown to 73 seconds.

Moth Cage explodes on impact, releasing 2 Loyal Moths that fly to their nearest target.

Loyal Moth variants:
â€¢ î…ƒArc Moths: slower-flying, offensive role. They seek out targets and detonate on contact, dealing up to 526 [31 to Players, 201 to Objects] damage in a 4 meter radius and î…ƒBlinding targets. Counts as î…ƒArc Grenade Damage.
â€¢ î…„Void Moths: faster-flying, support role. They seek out allies and grant them a 22.5 HP î…„Void Overshield on contact.

When no enemies are within ? meters of the detonation area, it spawns 2 î…„Void Moths. When only enemies are around, it spawns 2 î…ƒArc Moths.

When both allies and enemies are around, it spawns 1 î…ƒArc Moth and 1 î…„Void Moth.

â€¢ Hand Cannon: 4
â€¢ Linear Fusion Rifle, Pulse Rifle: unknown

Buff is removed 1? second after scoring a hit.

Scoring 2 Hits with Pulse Rifles that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants the Overload Shot buff to your next shot within the next 6 seconds.

Pulse Rifles without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Sustained fire for 0.6? seconds with Auto Rifles that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants the Overload Shot buff to your next shot within the next 6 seconds.

Auto Rifles without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Overload Shots/effects apply Disruption for 6.5 [5] seconds. Applying Disruption stuns Overload Champions and prevents them from regenerating health for the duration of the effect.

Disruption decreases damage dealt by PvE Combatants by 25%. It also decreases Melee, Grenade, and Class Ability regeneration speeds by 40% in PvP.

Sidearms without an intrinsic Breaker Type are granted Shield-Piercing rounds.

Sidearms without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Shield-Piercing weapons are required to break a Barrier Champion's immunity shield in order to stun them. Damaging their shields also halts their health regeneration for 1.6 seconds.

Additionally, Shield-Piercing weapons can overpenetrate an unlimited number of enemies. They also bypass Hydra Shields, Hobgoblin immunity, (Taken) Phalanx shields, and Scorn Buckler shields.

Titan Barricades receive 30% Increased Damage from Shield-Piercing weapons.

Holding a Full Draw for 1 second with Bows that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants Unstoppable Shots.

Bows without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Unstoppable Shots/effects are required to stun Unstoppable Champions â€“ immobilizing them and removing their passive 70% Damage Resistance for the duration of the stun.

Aiming Down Sights without firing for 1 second with Hand Cannons that don't have an intrinsic Breaker Type grants Unstoppable Shots.

Hand Cannons without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

Unstoppable Shots/effects are required to stun Unstoppable Champions â€“ immobilizing them and removing their passive 70% Damage Resistance for the duration of the stun.
